publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6075 Claire Baker: Congratulations to Madras College Pupilsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Madras College pupils who won three awards and were named Top Young Enterprise Company in Fife at the Young Enterprise Fife Awards held in Balgeddie House Hotel on Wednesday 23 March 2010; further commends pupils from all schools that took part in the Young Enterprise Fife programme; notes that the Young Enterprise programme provides young people with the opportunity to develop their potential and build up their confidence by testing their business ideas, and commends teachers, businessmen and -women and the Young Enterprise Fife board for facilitating the programme and subsequent awards ceremony. Supported by: Elizabeth Smith*, Bill Kidd*, Des McNulty*, Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*, Aileen Campbell*
S3M-6075 Congratulations to Madras College Pupils (lodged on 26 March 2010) John Park*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Mr Frank McAveety*
